backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, teams, mail, access control, and storage logic with permission checks and team membership constraints.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that maps old team structures into the new actor format by building a teamMembers index and preserving existing teams.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing updated frontend files, components used, and related test IDs for two team-membership UI features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, behavior, and recent feature updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color variables, dark mode values, and shared layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting document title and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling hash routing, authentication state, profile setup modal, and page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with error handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile via the backend.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfList.ts: Empty placeholder file replacing deprecated PDF list functionality.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfUploade: Empty placeholder file replacing deprecated PDF upload functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header bar showing navigation links, login button, and unread inbox count based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Wrapper layout component that applies max-width styling and optional title/description before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/teams/JoinReques: Button component handling all join‑team states including pending, full team, different team, and join requests.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamFootag: Displays team video footage with loading skeletons or an empty state when no videos exist.
Video uploader allowing team members to select, validate, preview, and upload footage with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamIconUp: Image uploader for team icons with validation, preview support, and replace/clear options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks fetching the caller's user profile and role using the current backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including creating AuthClient instances and exposing login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods related to teams, membership, inbox, and file uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, applying global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTeamPage.tsx: UI page allowing authenticated users to create a team, upload an icon, and handle related validation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero content, feature highlights, and navigation actions based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Inbox interface for viewing, reading, deleting, and responding to mail items, including join request approvals or denials.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderDashboardPage.t: Displays teams led by the authenticated user, showing pending join requests and navigation to team details or creation.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed team info, member status, icon and footage uploads, and leader actions like disbanding the team.
frontend/src/pages/TeamListPage.tsx: Lists all teams with icons and member counts, providing navigation to individual team detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/imageDataUrl.ts: Provides helpers to convert image bytes into blob-based or base64 data URLs for rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s state, features, constraints, and architectural notes for the Bey Hub X app.
